item.title: People Should Be Anti Offshoring or Anti Immigration, but Not Anti Foreigner
item.description: People Should Be Anti Offshoring or Anti Immigration, but Not Anti Foreigner Most people are anti-foreigner, which means that they are anti-immigration and anti-offshoring They don’t think of using immigration to end offshoring, because they’re not rational References (References:: [[Average is Over#Using Immigration to End Offshoring]])

item.title: Cultural Appropriation
item.description: Cultural Appropriation Are we just salty that people are accepting? I feel like if I was to pick a world where people liked dumplings or didn’t , I would much rather have the first.

item.title: I've Finally Left Home, But When Will Home Leave Me?
item.description: I’ve Finally Left Home, But When Will Home Leave Me? [[3. “Banana”]]
